title: Speed and Ratio Application Skill Development Program Through Productive Failure

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental arithmetic operations and graph interpretation skills
context.additional_context: Training in solving complex speed/rate problems based on real-life work scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can analyze speed/rate problems in various work environments with 80% accuracy.
Learners can invent and compare three or more problem-solving strategies through the productive failure process.
Learners can submit a final solution with 90% completeness by incorporating peer feedback in PBL projects.
Learners show a two-level or higher improvement in applied problem-solving skills in formative assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
